instructions: Tap Add to Siri. The app shows details about the task. Tap the Record button , then record any phrase you like. The recording stops when you stop speaking. To change the phrase, tap Re-Record Phrase. Tap Done.

Go to Settings > Siri & Search. Shortcut suggestions appear at the top of the screen for several of your most frequent tasks. To see more suggestions, tap More Shortcuts. To add a shortcut, tap it. Tap the Record button , then record any phrase you like. The recording stops when you stop speaking. To change the phrase, tap Re-Record Phrase. Tap Done.

Back up all necessary data that is on the internal memory. From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Scroll to and tap the Settings icon. Under WIRELESS & NETWORKS , tap Wi-Fi . If necessary, tap the Wi-Fi switch to turn on. Touch and hold the Wi-Fi network you want to delete. Tap Forget .

From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Scroll to and tap the Settings icon. Under WIRELESS & NETWORKS , tap Wi-Fi . If necessary, tap the Wi-Fi switch to turn on. Select the Wi-Fi network to which you want to connect. If prompted, enter the password. Tap Connect .
From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Scroll to and tap the Settings icon. Under WIRELESS & NETWORKS , tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to turn it on or turn off.
